title: High Total Debt Service
description: In 2023, El Salvador's total debt service was 82.98% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, indicating a high level of debt repayment obligations relative to its export earnings.

title: High Debt Service Relative to GNI
description: El Salvador's total debt service was 28.83% of its Gross National Income (GNI) in 2023, reflecting a significant debt burden compared to its national income.

title: Low Quality of Business Entry Regulations
description: In 2024, El Salvador scored 62.23 in the Quality of Regulations for Business Entry, indicating challenges in regulatory quality for starting businesses.

title: Low Efficiency in Resolving Insolvency
description: El Salvador had a score of 14.25 in 2024 for the Operational Efficiency of Resolving Judicial Insolvency Proceedings, suggesting inefficiencies in handling insolvency cases.

title: High Accessibility of Credit Information
description: In 2024, El Salvador achieved a score of 85.28 for the Accessibility of Information in Credit Infrastructure, indicating strong accessibility to credit information.
